lexUnit.name: bra.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a woman's undergarment worn to support the breasts.

sentence.text: Then suddenly she became aware of how inelegant she must look , sprawled there with her skirt up around her hips and her bra dangling out of her open blouse .
The model stood motionless , clad in nothing but her bra and stockings , waiting for his instructions .
LOOKING SWELL : Wondermodel Suzanne yesterday in her matching violet bra ( £13.99 ) and briefs ( £5.99 ) Picture : HARRY PROSSER
“ Right , who wants one ? ” says Samantha , producing a clutch of condoms from her bra .
The French kiss went on forever , and as the persistent tongue scoured the back of her throat , so she became aware of nimble fingers slipping her blouse from her shoulders and unfastening her bra .

of her nylon bra .

Every new nurse needs detailed instructions about how to care for her -- down to details such as pulling her bra on properly and making sure she is dry before getting her dressed .

The first time we went , Marie wore her bra and knickers , but she was told off for that , so she bought this real nice swimming costume .
